pages.text: Bears are strong, but wild and aggressive. With your dark powers, you're able to summon forth bears that are loyal towards you to the very end. When cast with $(l:crafts/wild_staff)Wild Staff$(), two bears are summoned at once, wearing a Wild Robe will summoned stronger versions where their claws even inflict Sapped on their victim.
When casting this focus in the Nether, instead of a Bear, you call forth a loyal Hoglin.
